description: various: use $GCFLAGS and $GCIMPORTS like Make does

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e03f5fc4f701 ***

various: use $GCFLAGS and $GCIMPORTS like Make does

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5489065

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>

> Is this causing problems for you?


Yes, but it's not very urgent, so it's mostly for consistency.


On Fri, Dec 16, 2011 at 8:24 PM, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> Work on Makefiles is not worthwhile at this point.
> They are going to be deleted very soon.
>
> Is this causing problems for you?
>
> Russ
>

Work on Makefiles is not worthwhile at this point.
They are going to be deleted very soon.

Is this causing problems for you?

Russ
